subject: Filtering.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_55bd_32bf_1899
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I usually don't do any filtering, but I'm finding alot of stuff in recent 
recordings that I don't hear at all until I run the noise reduction. 
'course, non of it is "ghost voices" per se`, but these space(y) guys.

Frank-S
